Its heart is in Greenwich Village around Washington Square Park, but with institutes and centers on the Upper East Side, academic buildings and dorms down on Wall Street, and NYU-Poly in downtown Brooklyn, getting from place to place at NYU requires a little assistance.        Luckily, there are a lot of options available to get around New York City. University Transportation services run between the Washington Square campus and NYU residence halls.   The MTA (Metropolitan Transportation Authority) runs the subway, train and bus systems that will get you where you need to go.   If all else fails and you're in the Village, head over to Broadway to catch a cab downtown (yellow cabs only, please) or over to Sixth Avenue to catch one going uptown.                                                          Public Transit                                                                                               Hop Stop Your Way Around NYC                                                                                         Find Your Way Around Campus                                                 Biking @ NYU-NYC Stay healthy and sustainable biking in and around NYU in NYC. Read More                                                              NYU Bike Share                                                                               NYU Traveler was created to provide the NYU community with tools and services for their travel needs and to help keep  them safer.   University-related travel may now be booked or registered through NYU Traveler . Route W                                                                   Route E       Transportation Service to/from points North of Washington Square, Including Residence Halls (Palladium, Coral Towers, Founders Hall, Gramercy Green), School Of Dentistry, School of Nursing, & NYU Langone Medical Center.   **NEW STOP LOCATION AT LANGONE MEDICAL CENTER: Shuttles now stop at M15 bus stop                                     To see a real time map of the buses on this route, go to Routes and Schedules and select the bus route you wish to view.            Designated Stops:       715 Broadway     14th Street At Third Avenue   First Avenue At 17th Street   First Avenue At 24th Street   First Avenue At 26th Street     NYU Langone Medical Cente   Lexington Avenue at 31st Street (Fridays Only)     Gramercy Green   Third Avenue at 17th Street   Third Avenue at 14th Street          Route E Academic Term Schedules:     Monday-Thursday   Friday   Weekend Service Provided via Route W .
